import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import styles from './AdminDetailCourses.module.scss' const AdminDetailCourses = (props) => { const [detailItem, setDetailItem] = useState() const { location } = props const arrVideos = useSelector((value) => value?.coursesReducer?.arrayVideosOfCourse) console.log('===============================================') console.log('detailItem', detailItem) console.log('===============================================') useEffect(() => { if (location?.state?.params !== undefined) { setDetailItem(location?.state?.params) } }) return (

{detailItem && detailItem.tenKhoaHoc}

{detailItem && detailItem.moTa}

    {arrVideos.map(() => (

    {item.soLuongDaBan}

    {`$ ${item.gia}`}

    • ))}
) } export default AdminDetailCourses
